article.title: Branching with Eclipse and CVS
article.description: This article presents a brief branch and merge scenario designed to quickly illustrate some branch and merge features of Eclipse's CVS integration. I assume the reader already appreciates the value of branching and merging in a source control environment. Little is said to justify it here. Rather, a step-by-step scenario illustrates the common branch and merge operations using Eclipse-based IDEs with CVS as the source control mechanism.
